org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configuration

类 AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.security.oauth2.config.annotation.web.configuration.AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @Import(value=AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration.TokenKeyEndpointRegistrar.class)
public class AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfiguration
extends Object

      • defaultAuthorizationServerTokenServices

        @Bean
public org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<AuthorizationServerTokenServices> defaultAuthorizationServerTokenServices()
        This needs to be a @Bean so that it can be @Transactional (in case the token store supports them). If you are overriding the token services in an AuthorizationServerConfigurer consider making it a @Bean for the same reason (assuming you need transactions, e.g. for a JDBC token store).
        返回:
        an AuthorizationServerTokenServices

      • getEndpointsConfigurer

        public AuthorizationServerEndpointsConfigurer getEndpointsConfigurer()
